std_narrative.citation:
Robert, child of Michael Hall & Margaret Hall, was born on 16 June 1833 and baptised on 26 June 1833 in Alnwick, Northumberland, England. '''Baptism''': "Non-Conformist and Non-Parochial BMDs"
[https://www.thegenealogist.com/search/advanced/bmd/non-conformist/full/?id=715878515&uid_type=2 The Genealogist Record] (accessed 6 May 2021)
